Description: This is a great unit in a quiet building. Please note this is configurable either as a 3 split or a 3 bed with a living room, so the common area as a split is in the kitchen area (currently there are 3 tenants in the unit so the front bedroom is used as a living room). Walking distance to MIT and Harvard, Central square, Whole Foods, Trader Joe's & Charles River, park with basketball very close by.
